name: How Pinterest delivers software at scale with Nishant Roy, Engineering Manager at Pinterest Ads (Go Time #257)
summary: Nishant Roy, Engineering Manager at Pinterest Ads, joins Johnny &amp; Jon to detail how they’ve managed to continue shipping quality software from startup through hypergrowth all the way to IPO. Prepare to learn a lot about Pinterest’s integration and deployment pipeline, observability stack, Go-based services and more...
